enum.asset_type.char.desc: Character model assets, including main characters, supporting characters, NPCs, etc.
enum.asset_type.prop.desc: Prop and non-character model assets, such as weapons, tools, furniture, etc.
enum.asset_type.env.desc: Scene and environment assets, such as buildings, terrain, backgrounds, etc.
enum.asset_type.fx.desc: Visual effects assets, such as explosions, fire, smoke, particles, etc.
enum.asset_type.veh.desc: Vehicle assets, such as cars, aircraft, ships, etc.
enum.asset_type.veg.desc: Vegetation assets, such as trees, flowers, shrubs, etc.
enum.asset_type.light.desc: Lighting setup assets, such as HDRI, lighting presets, etc.
